attributes.action: Change grandparents claiming funding childcare for family
attributes.additional_details: Change especially before 2024 all 2 yr olds and September open to 9mths , grandparents can offer the gap in childcare I've been offering 15yrs happy access to all equal in all ways but one- this free funding
attributes.background:
Equal to Wales and Scotland 
Access to all my policies say and equal opportunities  but the government stop me claiming funding childcare for my own grandchildren who are contracted as other children and set hours/days but are unable to claim due to England not offering equal opportunities

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
